title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-3.1 - When established
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-3.1 - When established

State Regulations

Painting and decorating reserves shall be set aside out
of project revenue for each project as of the last day of each calendar quarter
beginning with the quarter in which the date of substantial completion
falls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1647-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
